turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hi! Thanks for participating. Would you like to donate some of what you'll earn from this task to an awesome charity called Save the Children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hi! Can you please tell me a bit about this charity?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Sure. It's an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That sounds great. I don't know how much I am able to give right now.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well, since you are earning money from this hit, you would be able to donate any or all of it.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Technically I could, but what difference would donating $2 make?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Every little bit helps. There are 127 of these hits available. If each person donated $2, it would be $256, ahich would be great.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That's a good point.  Do you know how much money goes to the children vs. paying people's salaries?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes! In 2017, 86% of all expenditures went to program services. 9% went to fundraising and only 5% went to management.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thank you for that information. That is very helpful. I am happy to hear so much goes to program services.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: So, how much would you like to donate to the charity? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. Any amount would be very appreciated, but of course, the more the better, lol.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: How much do you think I should donate today? What would you do if you were me?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Well, I feel that this is a very important cause. I mean, who doesn't want to support a charity that provides disaster relief, and feeds  starving children, and helps care for refugees? If it were me, I would donate the entire $2. To us, it's not much, but to them it means a lot.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Well, unfortunately I need all the money I can get these days.  I will donate some but I can't donate all of it.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Okay, I totally understand. I'm in the same boat, which is why I work so hard on MTurk! How about $1.50 ? Some for you and some for the children..

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I still think that's a bit more than I can go right now. I do plan on donating independently when things are better.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That's great. I try to donate when I can as well. Sometimes I decide to give up some small indulgences like the Dunkin Donuts iced coffee I love just so I can have some to give to those that are less fortunate. Do you think you might be able to skip a cup of coffee or a snack this week to help these kids? It sounds like you'd really like to donate. Think of how good it would make you feel to know you've helped someone today.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes it would make me feel good. I already skip all of those things. I've been skipping paying some bills unfortunately too. It's a hard decision.  I was thinking $1.00,

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: $1.00 would be awesome! You seem like a great person who is really concerned about others. If you commit to that now, the research team will collect it and send it to Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thank you for convincing me! I commit to donating $1 to Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Thank you so much! Have a wonderful day.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Thank you. I hope you have a great day too!
